sentences.english: You can spot reduce for tight abs or toned arms.
sentences.chinese: 你能恰好減肥到擁有緊縮的腹肌和優美的手臂。

sentences.english: The officer asked us to stand straight and keep stomach muscles in.
sentences.chinese: 長官要求我們站直並收緊腹肌。

sentences.english: He even pulled up his shirt to show me his toned and tanned abs on his new washboard stomach.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至撩起襯衫給我看他那健美膚色強健的腹肌。

sentences.english: The "six-pack abs" bags above are a prime example.
sentences.chinese: 上面的這種“六塊腹肌”購物袋，就是最好的例證。

sentences.english: Concentrate on using your stomach muscles to hold yourself straight and remember to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 集中精神用你的腹肌保持你自己挺直並記住呼吸。

sentences.english: The nurse will tell you when to bear down.
sentences.chinese: 分娩時護士會告訴你何時使勁收縮腹肌。

sentences.english: Legs up, working the full range of the abdominals.
sentences.chinese: 腿向上，在腹肌的最大範圍內鍛鍊。

sentences.english: You are breathing"high", using your rib rather than your abdominal muscles.
sentences.chinese: 因爲您正在運用肋間肌，而非腹肌進行深呼吸。

sentences.english: I also would like to know how that husband's "six-pack" is coming along.
sentences.chinese: 我也想知道內交丈夫的六腹肌是怎麼出來的。

sentences.english: The line between lateral semicircular canals and crista of digastric muscle is the mark of mastoid segment.
sentences.chinese: 外半規管至二腹肌嵴前端是面神經乳突段的標誌線。

sentences.english: Its largest perforating branch arised behind the medial border of the anterior belly of the digastrics muscle.
sentences.chinese: 其最大的一個穿支出現於二腹肌前腹內側緣的後面。

sentences.english: You can’t play rugby with five-pack abs.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，你可不能用五塊腹肌玩橄欖球。

sentences.english: As you can see from this photo, planking can build strong abs.
sentences.chinese: 從這個照片可以看到，懸空能鍛鍊強有力得腹肌。

sentences.english: I also would like to know how that husband’s “six-pack” is coming along.
sentences.chinese: 我也想知道那位丈夫的六腹肌是怎麼出來的。

sentences.english: The muscles in her stomach rival Steve's and flex as she breathes.
sentences.chinese: 她的腹肌比的上斯蒂文，當她呼吸時腹肌就會繃起。

sentences.english: The muscles in her stomach rival Steve's and flex as she breathes.
sentences.chinese: 她的腹肌比的上斯蒂文，當她呼吸時腹肌就會繃起。

definition: pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
rectus abdominis muscle (aka abdominals or abs)
triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
